com.xrtb.exchanges

Class Nexage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xrtb.pojo.BidRequest
      • com.xrtb.exchanges.Nexage

  • public class Nexage
extends BidRequest
    A Bid request for Nexage. Exchanges can introduce their own JSON into the bid request, so all the special parsing is done in a class that extends the BidRequest. All standard bid requests are handled in the BidRequest super class. The exchange only handles those values specific to the exchange.

    The interrogate() method of the base class is used to retrieve the object values from the class.

    Author:
    Ben M. Faul

      Nexage()
      Make a default constructor, the bidder keeps a representative class instance for each exchange so it can use a Map to make new bid requests per the format of the bid request.
